structure.unit: ARTICLE LXVIII. AGRICULTURAL PRACTICES ADVISORY BOARD

text.section:
Sec. 2-932. Definitions.
For the purposes of this article, the following definitions apply:
A proprietorship, partnership, or other firm that provides goods, services, or supplies to those actively engaged in bona fide agriculture.
The Agricultural Practices Advisory Board.
The Director of the Department of Planning and Zoning or his or her designee.
Statutes, ordinances, resolutions, and policies.
